title: Walking the Edge
description: The next step might be the last...A woman without a pastLeft amnesiac after an accident, Amelia Jamison struggles as her instincts slowly rise from the depths of oblivion, leading her to question her life as the wife of a cold, manipulating and distant man. Wisps of a dream show her another man she may have known intimately, but is he a memory, or a figment of her imagination?A man with too much informationAfter many aliases, today Gerard Besson is simply a police commissaire in Marseille. When a mysterious woman starts to follow him, he is suspicious - and intrigued. But things aren't what they seem, and as he reluctantly gets closer to her, dregs of his painful, buried past emerge and make him question her identity.Each seems to have led several different livesBut neither is prepared for what awaits them when they cross the fine line between knowing your true self and that of your alter ego. Danger is the name of the game, and as it catches up with them in the French Provence, both know they better be ready for the inevitable fall.
author: Zee Monodee
